casebody.data:
Bruce GREEN, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. TRIMAC TRANSPORTATION, INCORPORATED, Defendant-Appellee. No. 12-41150

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 17, 2013. Bruce Green, Beaumont, TX, pro se. Kip Kevin Lamb, Lamb Law Firm, Mark William Frasher, Beaumont, TX, for Defendant-Appellee. Before WIENER, ELROD, and GRAVES, Circuit Judges. *334PER CURIAM: *

For essentially the reasons articulated in the district court judgment, we AFFIRM. See 5th Cir. R. 47.6.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
